title: How to Make Sloe Gin Fizz

steps.headline: Fill a mixing glass with ice from the freezer.
Combine the ice with sloe gin, lemon juice, and powdered sugar.
Place a lid on the mixing glass.
steps.description: Hold it firmly and shake for about 20 seconds.

steps.headline: Strain the shaken mixture into a Collins glass.
Add soda water into the Collins glass.
Garnish the drink with slices of cherry and orange.
